DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effectiveness web-based care management either telephone-based care management internet access alone , patient poorly control diabetes mellitus .
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Patients diabetes elevated hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) risk diabetes-related complication . Care-management may helpful patient , provide direct contact high-risk patient healthcare system . Web-based system previously show promise mean neutralizing access barrier schedule travel appointment may particular help improve diabetes care . Objectives : We examine efficacy two method diabetes education care management : ( 1 ) traditional model involve telephone contact face-to-face encounter ( 2 ) web-based model access diabetes care management web site . We compare intervention study group receive education care management provide computer access diabetes self-management website . Methods : This study employ randomize , parallel group design involve patient diabetes mellitus elevate HbA1c ( 8.5 % ) . Participants assign web-based care management receive notebook computer , Internet access interact care manager diabetes education care management website . Participants receive telephone-based care management interact care manager use telephone face-to-face contact . Both care management model employ medication algorithm improve glucose BP control . These care management group compare study group care management receive notebook computer Internet access `` home page '' contain links series diabetes self-management website ( i.e . computer group ) . The primary outcome measure HbA1c , blood pressure , score Problem Areas Diabetes ( PAID ) questionnaire , measure 12-months . Status : Complete
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis diabetes mellitus Age 2579 year HbA1c > =8.5 % Ability speak understand English Telephone access VAbased primary care provider Interest use glucose BP monitor notebook computer Visual impairment affect ability read
